content:
Hi [fullName],
You are invited by an Administrator of CMP platform to join for the role of [role].

You can proceed with your registration by accepting invitation by clicking on the following link.

Please ignore if you think this is not intended for you.

Note: Link will be expire in 15 minutes


Best Regards,
CITIIS Management Platform Team
subject: Invitation from CITIIS Management
